sections.heading: Core Function
sections.content: ほど expresses extent or degree - "as much as" or "to the extent of".

children.heading: 1. Comparison "As... As"
children.content:
With negative:

彼ほど速くない "not as fast as him" これほど美味しいとは "didn't know it's this delicious"

children.heading: 2. Approximate Amount
children.content: 10個ほど - "about 10" 1時間ほど - "about 1 hour" 少しほど - "a little bit"

children.heading: 3. "The More... The More"
children.content:
Pattern: [Verb conditional]ば[Verb]ほど

勉強すればするほど分かる "the more you study, the more you understand" 見れば見るほど好きになる "the more I see it, the more I like it"

sections.heading: Common Patterns
sections.content: [Noun]ほど[Negative] 彼ほど速くない - "not as fast as him" [Number]ほど 10個ほど - "about 10" [Verb]ば[Verb]ほど やればやるほど - "the more you do, the more..."

sections.heading: Key Takeaways
sections.content:
✓ Extent/degree comparison ✓ Approximation ✓ "The more... the more" pattern ✓ Often with negative for comparison
